detaileddescription.para: Traceability - SWR and SWDD The traceability between SWR and SWDD (model and implementation) is established on SW unit and function/code level by requirements identifier links. The overview of the requirements allocation on file level can be found on the ExportedDoorsSpecification_0_requirements page. The overview of the requirements allocation on function level can be found on the Requirement Implementation page. Invalid and outdated requirements were not imported to this documentation. It was done to avoid misleading information about not satisfied requirements.

Traceability - SWA and SWDD The traceability between SWA and SWDD is established by collecting all fuctions dedicated to serve the role of Active Participant in one library called "BAPHandler_PSO_ImExport".
Traceability - SWDD and Implementation The traceability between SWDD and implementation is established by using identical sw unit names (in SWDD and implementation).
